metadata.name: Suspicious Advpack Call Via Rundll32.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "rundll32" calling "advpack.dll" with potential obfuscated ordinal calls in order to leverage the "RegisterOCX" function

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('rundll32.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('advpack')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#+')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('12')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#-')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "rundll32" calling "advpack.dll" with potential obfuscated ordinal calls in order to leverage the "RegisterOCX" function
